snippet: Three leading female Russian athletes, including European marathon champion Nailya Yulamanova, have been banned for two years for doping.
lead_paragraph: Three leading female Russian athletes, including European marathon champion Nailya Yulamanova, have been banned for two years for doping.

headline.seo: Top Russian Track and Field Trio Banned for Doping
headline.main: Top Russian Track and Field Trio Banned for Doping
